songs.title: Hanging On (I See MONSTAS Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse]
You know we can get away
Because I'm calling your name
Every day I feel this pain
But you just turn and walk away

[Chorus 1]
I just can't keep hanging on
To you and me
I just don't know what is wrong
With you and me
With you and me

[Break 1]
Touch me and then turn away

[Instrumental Drop]

[Chorus 2]
I just can't keep hanging on
I just can't keep hanging on
I just can't keep hanging on
To you and me
I just can't keep hanging on
To you and me
I just don't know what is wrong

[Verse]
You know we can get away
Because I'm calling your name
Every day I feel this pain
But you just turn and walk away

[Break 2]
With you and...

[Instrumental Drop]
